title: Rudy the Rougarou: Bully No More
description: In this second book in the Rudy the Rougarou series, we find Rudy and his friend Marshmallow as they stumble upon a young girl, Sophia, who is being intimidated by the mean bully, CrayJaya! Can Rudy and Marshmallow help Sophia? What's going to happen? Will CrayJaya succeed in bullying Sophia? Read on to see how things turn out for Sophia.
author: Dan Reidmiller
